name: s3up
description: A simple function to upload files to Amazon S3. Refactored from my original Meteor S3 package.

scripts.prepublish: node_modules/.bin/coffee --no-header --compile --output jsFromCoffee/ src/ && node_modules/.bin/babel jsFromCoffee -d lib
scripts.make-docs: npm run prepublish && jsdoc lib -r -d docs && rm -rf lib

author: lepozepo
